orange-rectangle.description: This should be a simple orange rectangle

text-only.description: Text, large, green with content TEXT

up-arrow-shape.description: An up arrow shape with a green background and red border

blue-star.description: A five sided star with a blue background

text-and-image.description: Two components, one text with TEXT, and an image.

bullets.description: Three lines of text with bullets at the front

bullets-with-formatting.description: One line of text with bold formatting, three lines of text with bullets at the front.  The second bullet is bold.

rotated-shapes.description: A rectangle shape and text shape, both are rotated.

basic-table.description: A single text element with green text 'TEXT' (misnamed - no actual table)

text-multiple-images.description: A header at the top, a large text box taking the left half of the screen - it must wrap and not be underneath the images, two images to the right one on top, one below.

failing-to-parse.description: Header at the top, large image to left, text with bullets to taking up half of page to right.
